issue.title: *** FAQ: How To Migrate Gazebo9 Controller(s) to Ignition ***

content.raw:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the feedback, good questions. Please see answers/comments below.

Q1 and Q2. I’ll get back to you on those later.

Q3. Notice that you will be creating and submitting Docker images and **NOT** containers. See this [PR](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/261) for more details. \(tutorial will come after merge\).

Q4 & Q6. I suggest starting with this [tutorial](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/CustomControl) as a “template”.

Q5. You can either create a single Docker image for all your agents \(as shown in the above [PR](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/261)\) or a Docker image for each agent. That is up to each team.

Q7. No, the catkin install is NOT being deprecated. However, we do encourage teams to use the Docker image to run the SubT Virtual Simulator; while you continue developing your solution in your local catkin workspace and later spinning out Docker image\(s\) of your solution to be tested with [Docker Composer](https://docs.docker.com/compose) before submitting it onto the Clousim \(as shown below\).

Q8. All of them.

Q9. We are currently in feature freeze for the tunnel circuit.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/14708963-solution_ws.png)
content.html:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the feedback, good questions. Please see answers/comments below.

Q1 and Q2. I’ll get back to you on those later.

Q3. Notice that you will be creating and submitting Docker images and NOT containers. See this PR for more details. (tutorial will come after merge).

Q4 & Q6. I suggest starting with this tutorial as a “template”.

Q5. You can either create a single Docker image for all your agents (as shown in the above PR) or a Docker image for each agent. That is up to each team.

Q7. No, the catkin install is NOT being deprecated. However, we do encourage teams to use the Docker image to run the SubT Virtual Simulator; while you continue developing your solution in your local catkin workspace and later spinning out Docker image(s) of your solution to be tested with Docker Composer before submitting it onto the Clousim (as shown below).

Q8. All of them.

Q9. We are currently in feature freeze for the tunnel circuit.
